content.rendered:
Tessa is about to make one of the most important decisions of her life, but suddenly everything turns upside down. The uncovering of secrets about the girl’s family puts his relationship with Hardin to the test more than ever, and this time it is not at all certain that there will be a happy ending to their love story.

Directed By Castille Landon

Written By Anna Todd. Sharon Soboil

Stars: Josephine Langford. Hero Fiennes Tiffin. Louise Lombard
